scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/eslint-config-custom/node_modules && rm -rf packages/libs/node_modules && rm -rf packages/ui/node_modules && rm -rf apps/mylab-portal/node_modules && rm -rf apps/mylab-portal/package-lock.json && rm -rf apps/mylab-portal-service/node_modules && rm -rf apps/mylab-portal-service/package-lock.json
scripts.clean-install: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/eslint-config-custom/node_modules && rm -rf packages/libs/node_modules && rm -rf packages/ui/node_modules && rm -rf apps/mylab-portal/node_modules && rm -rf apps/mylab-portal/package-lock.json && rm -rf apps/mylab-portal-service/node_modules && rm -rf apps/mylab-portal-service/package-lock.json && npm install
